message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
